title: Exposed - Part Three
description: From New York Times & USA Today Bestselling Author, Deborah Bladon.Part Three of EXPOSED Hunter changed Sadie's entire life. After discovering his connection to her past, she was ready to let go and embrace her new life. That one fateful night in Manhattan changed it all. After seeing Hunter for who he really is, Sadie must face painful truths about his past and their present. Her heart is pushing her in one direction. Her mind is pulling her towards a different path. Will Hunter's eventual confession change everything? As Sadie tries to accept who Hunter really is, she's forced to confront realities she never knew existed. She believes she's ready for it all, but is her heart strong enough?
author: Deborah Bladon
